channel.title: Beginner question on source and client
channel.description: So I am very new to rsps and clients confuse me. I have a source I want to run but not a client. I have other clients that I have downloaded for other sources but those do not work when I run the source I want to use. How do I find or edit a client to work with a particular source? I know how I worded the question may sound terrible and I am sorry if this question has been answered many times before. thank you.

item.title: Beginner question on source and client
item.dc:creator: @Bandos_Pk Ivycial
item.description:
@Bandos_Pk wrote:

i swear since i read this im drunk af now

Read full topic
